title: Trump is steamrolling global calls for a moratorium on deep-sea mining
full_text:
Trump is steamrolling global calls for a moratorium on deep-sea mining. The Trump administration took the next step toward unilaterally jumpstarting deep-sea mining this week, announcing a "consolidated" permitting process for both searching for and commercially extracting minerals that have so far remained relatively untouched. ….
The Trump administration is bending the rules to open up the deep sea to commercial mining for the first time. The Trump administration is bending the rules to… [+5483 chars]
